name: misskey
description: Misskey is a modern, decentralized social media platform built with ActivityPub. It supports real-time interactions, reactions, custom emoji, themes, and federation across servers.
features: Decentralized Social: ActivityPub-based federation allowing communication across different Misskey and Mastodon instances.
Real-time Interactions: Live timeline updates, instant notifications, and real-time chat functionality.
Custom Reactions: Express yourself with custom emoji reactions beyond traditional likes and shares.
Rich Media Support: Share images, videos, audio files, and documents with built-in media viewer and gallery.
Advanced Timeline: Multiple timeline views including local, federated, and custom lists with filtering options.
Theme Customization: Extensive theming system with custom CSS support and community-created themes.
Note Formatting: Rich text editing with Markdown support, mentions, hashtags, and content warnings.
Privacy Controls: Granular privacy settings for posts including follower-only, unlisted, and direct messages.
Moderation Tools: Comprehensive moderation features including content filtering, user blocking, and instance management.
API Integration: Full REST API for third-party clients, bots, and custom integrations.
Drive Storage: Built-in file storage system for managing uploaded media and documents with organization features.
Community Features: Create and manage communities, polls, and events with advanced engagement tools.
